artist: Painter: Claude Gellée (called Le Lorrain); Engraver: Pietro Antonio Martini
description: View of the Campo Vaccino; forum viewed from the west with figures resting next to ruins of a collonade on the right; Arch of Septimus Severus on the left
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

above image upper right corner in black: 24 |below image in black: Cl. le Lorrain   Martini Sc. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 24
title: Print
